template.name: uunfollow
template.value: coll.updateById(id, org.mongojack.DBUpdate.pull("following", toFollow)); coll.updateById(toFollow, org.mongojack.DBUpdate.pull("followers", id));

template.name: mrm3

template.name: mrr2
template.value: " var total = 0;" + " for (var i in counts) {" + " total += counts[i];" + " }" +
